summary:
This mod makes the model of plant shells transparent.
It looks like take whole clam shell instead of clam meat. Just for immersion.
Replace clam meat and clam texture.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/64843-0-1467210407.jpg[/img]
Location [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8355/?]Clam Farm[/url]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#1e84cc][b][size=5]Take clam shell[/size][/b][/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]This mod makes the model of plant shells transparent.
It looks like take whole clam shell instead of clam meat.
Just for immersion.
There is a shell of retexture and new meshes as an option.[/size][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/7688/?][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Special Edition version here.[/size][/font][/url]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#1e84cc][b][size=5][color=#1e84cc]Video[/color][/size][/b][/color][/font]
[youtube]oLrxevpss8Y[/youtube]
Thanks to [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzkN_dlUwVpL5dSzAdLsrLA]S.Silin (Ikari)[/url]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#1e84cc][b][size=5]My other mod[/size][/b][/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70386/?]Honey pot[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81556/?]Embrace cabbage[/url][b][size=5]

[color=#1e84cc]Special thanks[/color][/size][/b]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][url=http://thinkingskeever.hatenablog.com/]Thinking Skeever[/url]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39434/?]NMM Installer Tutorial - FOMOD - FOMM[/url][/size][/font]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/64843-0-1441981059.png[/img]
author: benitoite

files.name: 2.0 clam retexture
files.changelogHtml:
Add new main file. (small fix) Add new clam shell textures. Add new clam meat meshes.

Add new main file and fomod. (small fix) Add new clam shell textures. Add new clam meat meshes.
Special Thanks to

files.name: Take clam shell Full BAIN and Fomod 3.1
files.fileName: Take clam shell Full BAIN and Fomod 3.1-64843-3-1.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Recompressed the retexture of clam meat.
Add replace the vanilla clam meat model to a open clam shell with new clam meat inside.
There are two size.
